body:
@rehandalal I'm able to save the locales and countries, but I have to add them twice, or else they don't save. 
Steps to reproduce for locales (but also applies to countries):
1. Click on available local (ex. Acholi)
2. Click on "Add Locales" button
The local "Acholi" does not get saved on the selected locales table
3. Click on available local a second time (ex. Acholi)
4. Click on "Add Locales" button
Now "Acholi" gets saved on the selected locales table.
